00047     Image::Image(const Image& img)
00048         : QPixmap(img)
00049     {
00050         m_data = img.data();
00051         m_shortName = img.shortName();
00052         m_filePath = img.filePath();
00053         m_isLoaded = false;
00054         setObjectName("Image");

00114     QString Image::baseName() const
00115     {
00116         return QDir::fromNativeSeparators(m_filePath).section("/", 0, -2);
00117     }
00118 
00119     QString Image::fileName(QString filePath)
00120     {
00121         return QDir::fromNativeSeparators(filePath).section("/", -1, -1);
00122     }

00124     void Image::computeNewFileName(QString extension)
00125     {
00126         m_shortName = m_shortName.section('.', 0, -2)+"."+extension;
00127         m_filePath = baseName()+"/"+m_shortName;
00128     }
